main.title: 1280 High-Density Server
main.text: The 1280 high-density model is a 1U 2-socket rack server. It features high-performance computing, large-capacity storage, low power consumption, easy management, and easy deployment and is ideal for Internet, distributed storage, cloud computing, big data, and enterprise services.
bottomTip1: Move the mouse to rotate the model
bottomTip2: Move the mouse to move the model
bottomTip3: Move the mouse to zoom in or out the model
disk_spot: Up to ten 2.5-inch SAS/SATA HDDs or SSDs, or eight 2.5-inch NVMe SSDs.
power_spot: The PSUs are hot-swappable and work in 1+1 redundancy mode.
fan_spot: Fans Seven hot-swappable fan modules, allowing one-fan failures.
